mobileResponsivenessTip: Consider optimizing image sizes and layout for smaller screens to improve performance.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce the number of heavy assets and use browser caching to speed up load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve on-page SEO with more descriptive meta tags, alt text for images, and relevant keywords.
userExperienceTip: Simplify navigation and provide clearer call-to-action buttons.
bookingFlowTip: Offer a faster, streamlined booking process with fewer steps.
tips: Improve page speed by optimizing images and scripts.
